messages.title: Stronger for Scotland
messages.content: "Patrick will be a strong voice for you and your family."

leaflet.personalStatement: Introducing your local SNP Candidate: Patrick Grady moved to Glasgow in 1997 to study at Strathclyde University. He's gone on to work in the public and charity sectors, specialising in international development. Patrick was the SNP candidate for Glasgow North in 2010 and was a key local organiser in the Yes Kelvin campaign during the referendum.

contactInformation.address: Glasgow North Campaign Hub: The Quilt, Unit 20, 59 Ruchill Street, Glasgow G20 9PX

quotes.text: "Patrick will be a strong voice for you and your family."
